articles.description: Cambridge University academic writes guide suggesting Latin should be taught more creatively

articles.author: Pip Cook
articles.title: Queen death plans LEAKED: Urgent probe launched after top-secret files exposed - Express
articles.description: AN INQUIRY has been launched after official correspondence about plans for when the Queen dies were accidentally leaked by the Welsh government.

articles.description: Sotheby’s expects Femme nue couchée, which depicts Marie-Thérèse Walter as a sea-creature, to fetch over $60m next month
